en: Rare polar vortex event: Are we in for an icy December? An unusual development in the upper atmosphere over the North Pole could affect winter in Europe. It is still unclear what this could mean for a white Christmas in Germany.
la: Rare polaris vorticem eventus: An sumus in gelido Decembri? Progressio insolita in atmosphaera super polum septentrionalem hiemem in Europa afficere potuit. Incertum adhuc est quid hoc significare potuerit pro natalibus albis in Germania.
